name: Gwen The Hen 64
description:
Gwen the Hen:


Gwen the Hen 64 is a tiny 3D platformer collectathon that draws inspiration from plumbers, bears, hedgehogs, kids with hats, and many more.

It features precise controls, an expansive moveset, 10 distinct levels, and a 100% explorable HUB World.

Story:


Gwen is the world's most renowned scientist, and she is working on her latest invention: a machine that can produce infinite chocolate!

To complete her project, she needs your help! You will have to visit exotic and dangerous locations in search of mysterious components.
